about.title: This is me.
about.intro: Hello! I'm a Senior Software Engineer with over a decade of experience in the industry. I specialize in building scalable, sustainable software architectures and restructuring complex systems to enhance performance and maintainability.
about.expertise: While my core expertise lies in Angular, TypeScript, and NodeJS, I'm also deeply proficient in modern DevOps principles. I have hands-on experience migrating infrastructure using IaC tools like Terraform and Ansible, setting up CI/CD pipelines, and working extensively with containerization (Docker).
about.mentoring_accessibility: Beyond the code, I am passionate about fostering technical excellence in teams. I enjoy mentoring fellow developers and serving as the communication bridge between engineering, UI/UX designers, and product owners. I am also a dedicated advocate for web accessibility, with deep knowledge of implementing applications that meet stringent WCAG standards.
about.outro: I'm always open to discussing new challenges or collaborating on interesting projects. Feel free to get in touch or connect with me on LinkedIn.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: The following privacy policy applies to the use of this website. The operator of this website takes the protection of your personal data very seriously.
privacy.dataCollection:
Data collection and processing
When you visit this website, the web server automatically logs information such as your IP address, the date and time of access, the browser type and version, and the pages accessed. This data is collected for technical reasons to ensure the security and functionality of the website. The data is stored for a maximum of 7 days and then automatically deleted.
privacy.cookies:
Cookies and tracking
This website does not use cookies or tracking technologies. No personal data is collected or processed beyond the server logs mentioned above.
privacy.externalLinks:
External links
This website contains links to external websites (e.g., LinkedIn). This privacy policy does not apply to these external websites. Please refer to the respective privacy policies of these providers.
privacy.emailContact:
Email contact
If you contact us via email, your email address and the content of your message will be stored to process and respond to your inquiry. This data will be deleted after your inquiry has been fully processed, unless legal retention periods require longer storage.
privacy.rightsHtml:
Your rights
You have the right to obtain information about the personal data stored about you (Art. 15 GDPR), to request correction (Art. 16 GDPR), deletion (Art. 17 GDPR), or restriction of processing (Art. 18 GDPR), as well as the right to data portability (Art. 20 GDPR). You also have the right to object to processing (Art. 21 GDPR) and to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority (Art. 77 GDPR).
privacy.changes:
Changes to this privacy policy
We reserve the right to update this privacy policy to reflect changes in legal requirements or our services. The current version is always available on this page.
